title: I am permanently banned!
body:
Hello everyone, last month i was banned for 2 weeks for my bad behavior and being toxic and I knew if I keep doing it I will get a perma ban! :(

But didn't know saying stuff like "stupid, dumb etc" will get me banned (Thought only more offensive words matters Because everyone say stuff such as stupid, dumb...)

Ok I know It's a perma ban but is there a way i get unbaned?

I know it's not my first time but i realy want 1 more chance ;(

Thanks for ready ;)

replies.body: Show us chat logs and we will prove to you how toxic you were. Also, one more chance? You already got like 4

>But didn't know saying stuff like "stupid, dumb etc" will get me banned

You didn't know people don't like being called "stupid" or "dumb"?

social skills...?
Riot dosent usually undo punishments but if you feel that you did not deserve it you can submit support ticket

Please don't bump posts with no additional information please.

Riot does not typically remove permanent bans, as you must be escalated up through [4 tiers of punishment](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) to reach one. Each time you are punish the penalty increases, and it tells you that continuing your behavior will do so, including when you receive a 14 day ban that the next penalty is a permaban.

While you are unlikely to ever recover this account you are still allowed to play on a new account, so I encourage you to post the chat logs you received so we can review them and help you improve your behavior so that this doesn't happen again.
